HEALTH.name: Health
HEALTH.description: Restores a small amount of health.

STAMINA.name: Stamina
STAMINA.description: Restores a small amount of stamina.

AETHERIUM_CRYSTAL.name: Aetherium Crystal
AETHERIUM_CRYSTAL.description: A crystal that defies gravity, pulsing with raw, untamed magic from another plane.

CELESTIAL_SHARD.name: Celestial Shard
CELESTIAL_SHARD.description: A fragment of a fallen star, shimmering with all the colors of the cosmos.

CRIMSON_CRYSTAL.name: Crimson Crystal
CRIMSON_CRYSTAL.description: Also known as a 'Blood Gem,' this stone holds the life force of the earth.

EMBER_CRYSTAL.name: Ember Crystal
EMBER_CRYSTAL.description: A crystal that feels warm to the touch, containing the essence of fire.

GOLD_ORE.name: Gold Ore
GOLD_ORE.description: A heavy, soft metal, gleaming with a promise of wealth and power.

JADE_SHARD.name: Jade Shard
JADE_SHARD.description: A smooth, green stone associated with nature and resilience.

ROCK_SHARD.name: Rock Shard
ROCK_SHARD.description: A common, jagged piece of rock. Can be crushed for basic components.

SOUL_GEM_FRAGMENT.name: Soul Gem Fragment
SOUL_GEM_FRAGMENT.description: A mesmerizing gem that seems to contain a swirling nebula. Used in enchanting soul-bound weapons.

STORM_FORGED_CRYSTAL.name: Storm-Forged Crystal
STORM_FORGED_CRYSTAL.description: A crystal forged in a magical thunderstorm. It crackles with contained lightning.

DRAGONSCALE_SHARD.name: Dragonscale Shard
DRAGONSCALE_SHARD.description: A shard from the scale of a true dragon. Almost indestructible and highly resistant to magic.

OBSIDIAN_SHARD.name: Obsidian Shard
OBSIDIAN_SHARD.description: Volcanic glass, sharp and brittle. Excellent for crafting daggers or serrated blades.

SERPENTINE_GEM.name: Serpentine Gem
SERPENTINE_GEM.description: A swirling green gem that seems to writhe with inner life. Grants resistance to poisons.

FROST_ORE.name: Frost Ore
FROST_ORE.description: A shimmering blue ore that radiates cold. Used in crafting frost-resistant gear.

HELMET_WARRIOR.name: Warrior Helmet
HELMET_WARRIOR.description:
Helmet designed specifically for warriors which provides solid protection during combat. 
Health Bonus +3% Defense Bonus +5%

ARMOR_WARRIOR.name: Warrior Armor
ARMOR_WARRIOR.description:
Warrior Armor is a rugged combat attire designed specifically for warriors. 
Health Bonus +5% Spell Bonus +5%

BRACELETS_WARRIOR.name: Warrior Bracelets
BRACELETS_WARRIOR.description:
These Warrior Bracelets are wristbands tailored for warriors, enhancing their protection in battle. 
Attack Bonus +5% Critical Bonus +3%

TROUSERS_WARRIOR.name: Warrior Trousers
TROUSERS_WARRIOR.description:
Warrior Trousers are specialized pants crafted to provide warriors with both comfort and protection. 
Defense Bonus +3% Stamina Bonus +5%

BOOTS_WARRIOR.name: Warrior Boots
BOOTS_WARRIOR.description:
These boots are customized to meet the demands of warriors. 
Stamina Bonus +3% Cooldown Bonus +3%

ARMOR_GUARDIAN.name: Guardian Armor
ARMOR_GUARDIAN.description:
Powerful ancient armor. 
Health Bonus +10% Attack Bonus +5%

RING_AMETHYST.name: Amethyst Ring
RING_AMETHYST.description:
This ring is a very rare piece of equipment. 
Stamina Bonus +8% Spell Bonus +8% Cooldown Bonus +5%

CHARM_THUNDERBOLT.name: Thunderbolt Charm
CHARM_THUNDERBOLT.description:
This charm is a very rare piece of equipment. 
Health Bonus +15% Attack Bonus +10% Critical Bonus +10%

FROST_THISTLE_BERRY.name: Frost-Thistle Berry
FROST_THISTLE_BERRY.description: A pale blue berry covered in tiny, harmless crystalline spikes. Grants temporary resistance to fire and heat.

GLIMMER_ROOT_BERRY.name: Glimmer-Root Berry
GLIMMER_ROOT_BERRY.description: When consumed in darkness, it causes the user to emit a soft, guiding light for a short time.

GRAVE_WORT_BERRY.name: Grave-Wort Berry
GRAVE_WORT_BERRY.description: A dark, almost black berry found in shaded, damp places. Briefly enhances the power of spells.

MENDERS_BERRY.name: Mender's Berry
MENDERS_BERRY.description: A plump, light-green berry. Boosts the effectiveness of healing potions and spells for a brief period.

SUN_KISSED_BERRY.name: Sun-Kissed Berry
SUN_KISSED_BERRY.description: Tastes of summer sunshine. Restores a small amount of stamina.

WHISPER_VINE_BERRY.name: Whisper-Vine Berry
WHISPER_VINE_BERRY.description: A muted purple berry that grows on hanging vines. A key ingredient in sleep potions.
